titleStmt.title: Gods sword drawn forth against drunkards and swearers blasphemers of Gods Holy Name, whore-mongers, Sabbath breakers, and other lewd livers of all sorts. In which is set forth the abominable and beastly sin of drunkenness, with its attendant vices. In forty three terrible examples of Gods immediate judgements upon several drunkards, and other impenitent sinners. Necessary to be had in all houses, being a caution to young and old. By J. Srenock, B.D. Licensed and entred according to order.
titleStmt.author: Srenock, J.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Joshua Conyers at the Black Raven in Duck Lane,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect; pages cropped and stained with some loss of text.
